content: That's really helpful, thanks! I think I'll start with the 1:1:1 ratio and adjust from there. I'm excited to experiment and find the perfect balance of flavors for my Lavender Dream cocktail. By the way, speaking of experimenting with flavors, I've been trying out different hot sauces lately and I recently made my own hot sauce using jalapenos from my garden. Have you tried making your own hot sauce before?
